000000 01010 00001 00010 00000 100001
        RS0   RT1  RD2  
ADDU 2 = 0 + 1

001111 00000 00001 0000000000000111
LUI RT = 7 

000000 00010 00011 00001 00000 100111

100011 00000 00010 0000000000000111


LW 00010, 7(00000)
     RT       RS
00001 = 01010 + 00010
RD        RS  +  RT
000000 01010 00010 00001 00000 100001



ADDU 15, 4,5 
000000 00101 00100 01111 00000 100001

SUBU 18, 15,17
000000 01111 10001 10010 00000 100011

AND 19,15,20
000000 01111 10100 10011 00000 100100


FFFFF
[POS]VALOR
[15]33 = [16]16 + [17]17
[18]16 = [15]33 - [17]17
[19]0 = [15]33 * [20]20



BEQ [9]9, [15]9, mem[2]
000100 01001 01111 0000000000000010

ADDU [10]33, [16]16 ,[17]17 
000000 10000 10001 01010 00000 100001

ADDU RD[4]33, RS[16]16 ,RT[17]17 
000000 10000 10001 00100 00000 100001

SW RT[4]33,mem[6]
101011 00000 00100 0000000000000110

ADDI [8]43,[4]33,10
001000 00100 01000 0000000000001010






//LUI [4]4,-15
//001111 00000 00100 1111111111110001

//ADDI [4]15,[0]0,17
//001000 00000 00100 0000000000010001





ADDU [15]9, [4]4,[5]5
000000 00101 00100 01111 00000 100001

BEQ [9]9, [15]9, mem[2]
000100 01001 01111 0000000000000010

ADDU [10]33, [16]16 ,[17]17 
000000 10000 10001 01010 00000 100001

ADDU RD[4]33, RS[16]16 ,RT[17]17 
000000 10000 10001 00100 00000 100001

ADDU [1]9, [4]4,[5]5
000000 00101 00100 00001 00000 100001

LW 1, 7(00000)
100011 00000 00001 0000000000000111

BEQ [1]7, [7]7, mem[2]
000100 00001 00111 0000000000000100

SW 00010, 15(00000)
